job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core traditional software engineering activities focused on building and maintaining software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
job_tasks.justification: These are standard activities within the software development lifecycle, pertaining to the creation and refinement of software components.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the development, testing, and quality assurance of software features.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
job_tasks.justification: Paired programming and code reviews are established software development practices aimed at improving code quality and knowledge sharing.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the application of established methods for building quality software components and solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase describes working collaboratively with a stakeholder (Product Owner) to define requirements, which is a key aspect of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions communication, setting expectations, and fostering a positive team environment, all falling under communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the importance of teamwork, utilizing collective expertise, and sharing knowledge within a team.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses entirely on traditional software development tasks (design, development, testing, maintenance) using C++ for a specific software product (NX CAM). Despite the mention of 'AI' in the title, there are no responsibilities or technologies listed that relate to building, integrating, or specializing in AI/ML models, generative AI, or traditional machine learning.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and detailed regarding the responsibilities and required technical skills, unambiguously defining a traditional software engineering role. The mention of 'AI' in the title does not translate into any specific AI/ML tasks in the description.
